channel.title: How to increase spec of ags
channel.description:
Hi i want to no how to increase the max hit of the spec for armadyl gs So...i want the spec to hit more when it specs on other players....
Thanks

item.title: How to increase spec of ags
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

Its now about the best they can be. They can be as good as you want. The getHit is the percent chance of a high hit. So at 0 rarely any good hits whatsoever and at 100 pretty much every hit is mid 70s and 80s. The hitdiff basically determines how different the spec hit is from the regular attack. If you dont have a hitdiff on a spec it will not hit any more than a regular attack. By adding what i told you you will be greatly increasing the attack power of your god swords. Also you might want to increase the getHit on your dds as the dds on delta source is utterly useless.

Read full topic
item.source: How to increase spec of ags

item.title: How to increase spec of ags
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Wait What Does hitdif do? and wat does get hit do and whats the best they can be?

item.title: How to increase spec of ags
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

use the first one. It more closely resembles it…now just add whats missing. Add the hitdiff line or else it will just hit what the str bonus allows which with an ags is only about 40. Then you can change your getHit to whatever percentage you want

Read full topic
item.source: How to increase spec of ags

item.title: How to increase spec of ags
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

One of them look like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(3547); specialAmount -= 50; getHit(30); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655);

and the other looks like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 3547); npcDamage(30); specGFX(655); }

And it dont have what u said it should have…?

Read full topic
item.source: How to increase spec of ags

item.title: How to increase spec of ags
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

I take it you are on delta source. What you do is search for is if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ now there are 2 of these. The right one has something like this under it setAnimation(3547); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 40); getHit(60); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); } now do you see where it shows the misc.random(playerMaxHit +40); yours will probably not have the plus 40, but add a number to that to make it add more damage. Then find the getHit() code. If you dont have one just add it. This is the percentage chance of landing a good hit. 50-70 is best range. Hope i helped

Read full topic
